short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Celebrate Bitcoin's domination over gold by replacing the inferior monetary standard with Bitcoin when browsing Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In the wake of Bitcoin's domination over gold, the monetary standard and luxury item that garners a false perception of value among most of the world, celebrate this feat by replacing the word gold with Bitcoin when browsing chrome. If not for this reason, at least install this and head over to the top 50 quotes about gold webpage and have a good laugh!
